Detailed Description

Structure for describing the SPI device with a description string and bitmasks for each of the pins.

uint32_t spiDeviceInfo_t::writeAdds[4][2]

When supporting reprogramming, there will be large gaps in the code.

This array stores addresses, where data should be written. There can be 4 different writes, and the start address, and write count is stored.
